We have carefully selected our wedding venue for our guests to experience an authentic cultural immersion. Hacienda de Cortes was a sugar cane estate founded by Hernan Cortes in 1530. It’s historic past transcends through its stone walls, lush gardens, and architectural magnificence.

We chose this XVI century estate to open our guest’s minds to Mexico’s rich history, and to expose them to the traditions and customs of Salma's home country.
